answerText: limit cycle [or periodic orbit][10]  Limit cycles arise in the study of this type of system, whose state changes with time. They are usually nonlinear and are described by a differential equation when continuous in time.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 3 | 16 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Any trajectory on one of these things stays on it forever and any trajectory sufficiently close to it must asymptotically approach some trajectory in it. For 10 points each: [10] Any trajectory on one of these things stays on it forever and any trajectory sufficiently close to it must asymptotically approach some trajectory in it. For 10 points each:
